description: This file defines a CartAdapter class for rendering and managing a list of shopping cart items in an Android app. It handles view creation, data binding, user interactions such as incrementing, decrementing, editing, and removing cart items, and optimizes updates via DiffUtil.

classes.name: CartAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView Adapter for displaying cart items with interaction handlers.

classes.name: CartAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class holding references to item view components.

methods.name: areItemsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two cart lines represent the same item based on ID and configuration key.

methods.name: areContentsTheSame
methods.description: Checks if two cart lines have identical content.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Inflates the item layout and creates a ViewHolder.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data to the ViewHolder and sets up user interaction handlers.
